text:
Besides Trump, nobody helped spread the coronavirus more than Fox News pundit Sean Hannity.

New studies suggest a correlation between Hannity’s denial of the coronavirus, and a higher rate of cases in areas where he has the most viewers.

Watching Hannity literally kills people.
